content.text: Match ends, Hertha Berlin 2, Zorya Luhansk 0.
Second Half ends, Hertha Berlin 2, Zorya Luhansk 0.

Foul by Palko Dárdai (Hertha Berlin).
Foul by Niklas Stark (Hertha Berlin).
Iury (Zorya Luhansk) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Oleksandr Andrievsky (Zorya Luhansk) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Artem Sukhotsky following a corner.
Corner,  Zorya Luhansk. Conceded by Peter Pekarík.

Artem Sukhotsky (Zorya Luhansk) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Artem Sukhotsky (Zorya Luhansk).
